name: slabtrack-scanner
description: Desktop bulk scanner for SlabTrack - Scan, identify, and manage trading cards
author: SlabTrack

scripts.release: electron-forge make && gh release create v%npm_package_version% "out/make/squirrel.windows/x64/SlabTrack Desktop Scanner Setup.exe" --title "SlabTrack Scanner v%npm_package_version%" --notes "Desktop scanner for SlabTrack"
